name: get_weather
summary: Retrieves current weather information for a specified city and country using Google's weather service.
description: This function obtains the latest weather conditions for any city-country combination, provided that Google offers weather data for the specified location. It is designed to be universally applicable across all supported locales.

args.name: city
args.description: The city for which the weather conditions are to be retrieved.

args.name: country
args.description: The country in which the specified city is situated.

return_value.description: A comprehensive string detailing the current weather conditions in the given city, using data from Google's weather service.
